name: YouTeam
long_description:
YouTeam has helped more than 60 YC startups hire top-notch engineers they couldn't find elsewhere.

YouTeam connects you with select offshore developers seeking full-time contracts that aren't listed on any freelance portals or job boards. We are the only platform accessing this previously untapped talent pool, allowing us to select the "crème de la crème" of the talent.
one_liner: We make it easy for startups to hire engineers.
